modName: 2048 HD Stand-Alone Fur Robe and Hood - Male Variant
summary: W.I.P. - Male Variant of a Stand-Alone Fur Robe and Hood using the mantled apprentice model
descriptionHtml:
[b][center]Stand-Alone Fur Robe & Hood --- Male Variant[/center][/b]



[b][center]>>19/02/12<< Uploaded optimized textures lowering the size but maintaining 2028 HD[/center][/b] 

[b][center]>>17/02/12<< Version 1.02 is up ... I had to address some issues that were missed ... Fixed glow map issues on n file, Fixed leg & feet not showing, Adjusted color of top layer and I added some \"brighter\" Screens of the new model [/center][/b]

Finally got my brain around CK so that I can present to you a hi-rez male variant of the fur robes. It took me a little while to figure out the pathing, but in the end I was able to get it done. So we have a stand-alone light armor using the mantled apprentice robes, which I feel looks masculine if done correctly. This is still a W.I.P. so report bugs if you have them, it should be beast race compatible, and I placed them for sale at Lucan\'s Trading post in Riverwood. It is craft-able at the tanning rack & upgrade-able at the workbench. I haven\'t tried to enchant them yet but it shouldn\'t be an issue.

I think that\'s it ... oh you can also wear a circlet under the hood & if there was just a way to get rid of that man-purse I\'ll be a happy camper... 

Enjoy, I hope you like it!

Installation is drop the whole data folder into your main game directory then use NM to activate the esp.
=====================================================================================================================================

for the savvy ... you may want to unpack the archive onto your desktop to check the structure then copy the contents over to your data folder... it\'s up to you.
author: alienzerox

files.name: Fur Robe and Hood v1_02
files.changelogHtml:
fixed a glow map issue emanating from the n file
fixed issue with feet not showing
adjusted coloring of top layer
uploaded optimized texture files lowering the size while maintaining 2048 hi-rez
